articles.description: Erik ten Hag remains defiant after his side's dramatic draw at Porto but is the Manchester United boss still on the brink?
articles.title: Manchester United: Erik ten Hag still defiant but is the manager still on brink?

articles.description: Manager Philippe Clement laments Rangers' profligacy in their heavy Europa League defeat to Lyon - but are there bigger issues?
articles.title: Rangers 1-4 Lyon: Philippe Clement laments profligacy - but are there bigger issues?

articles.description: Harry Maguire rescues a dramatic draw for 10-man Manchester United after they had surrendered a two-goal lead - and had Bruno Fernandes sent off - at Porto in the Europa League.
articles.title: Porto 3-3 Manchester United: Harry Maguire heads home injury-time leveller

articles.description: Follow live text commentary, score updates and match stats from Rangers vs Olympique Lyonnais in the UEFA Europa League
articles.title: Rangers vs Olympique Lyonnais: UEFA Europa League - BBC Sport

articles.description: A Chelsea side showing 11 changes earn a comfortable win over Gent in their opening Europa Conference League match.
articles.title: Chelsea 4-2 Gent: Comfortable Conference League win for side showing 11 changes

articles.description: Tottenham make it two victories from their two Europa League games as a youthful Spurs side win in Hungary against Ferencvaros.
articles.title: Ferencvaros 1-2 Tottenham: Youthful Spurs side win in Hungary in Europa League

articles.description: Follow live text commentary, score updates and match stats from Dinamo Minsk vs Hearts in the UEFA Conference League
articles.title: Dinamo Minsk vs Hearts: UEFA Conference League - BBC Sport

articles.description: Listen and follow live text commentary, score updates and match stats from Fiorentina vs The New Saints in the Uefa Conference League
articles.title: Fiorentina vs The New Saints: Uefa Conference League - BBC Sport

articles.description: Interim England manager Lee Carsley says his squad selections will not be "copy and paste" and players will only be picked on merit during his time in charge.
articles.title: Lee Carsley: Interim England manager says there will be no 'copy and paste' squads

articles.description: Paris St-Germain lead the race to sign Mohamed Salah from Liverpool, who see Karim Adeyemi as a replacement, while Manchester United prepare a bid for Benfica's Kerem Akturkoglu.
articles.title: Football gossip: Salah, Adeyemi, Akturkoglu, Guehi, Duran, Garnacho
